CANNOT_DOUBLEMATCH.text: We couldn't make this match. The buyer probably just retracted their match with you, or another seller was faster.

EMPTY_RESPONSE.text: The Peach server returned an empty response. Please try again later or contact the Peach support-team.

INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.text: Oops, something went wrong! Please try again later, or contact us if the error persists.

NOT_FOUND.text: The resource you requested could not be found.

This most likely happens when you restored from seed and now cannot decrypt the buyer's secret.
Please wait for a new match.

PAYMENT_DATA_MISSING.text: Something went wrong, and this offer is missing your payment data.

PAYMENT_HASH_INVALID.text: This payment data is used in another Peach account. As we have a strict policy of one account per user to respect the trading limit, you will not be able to publish an offer
POST_OFFER_ERROR.text: Oops, something went wrong while posting your offer! Please try again later, or contact us if the error persists.

RETURN_ADDRESS_MISMATCH.text: The output of your transaction is invalid. Please contact Peach support.

TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: You made too many requests. Please try again later or contact the Peach support-team.
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS.text:
We like you a lot too, but maybe it's better if we take a break for a bit.

Please try again later, or contact us if the issue persists.
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS.title: too many requests
TRADING_LIMIT_REACHED: Your trading limit has been reached.
UNAUTHORIZED.text: You don't have permission to view this content.

UNAVAILABLE_FOR_LEGAL_REASONS.text:
Due to regulatory reasons, we're not available in your country.

You can still access the wallet, and finish up any trades you have open.

error.firstBackup.description:
Now that you've used the Peach Wallet, you should really make a backup before continuing.

If you don't, you'll lose your Peach account and any funds stored in the Peach wallet if you lose your phone.
error.firstBackup.title: make a backup!
error.general: Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact the Peach support-team.

escrow.wrongFundingAmount.description: You funded the escrow with $0 sats, while you made a trade for $1 sats.

help.addressSigning.description:
Because of Swiss law, you'll need to sign to verify that you own the address the trade will be paid out to.

If you don't know how this works, we recommend using the Peach wallet, where you don't need to go manually through this step.
help.addressSigning.title: address signing
help.buyingBitcoin.description:
When buying bitcoin on Peach, you'll first select a range of how much you want to buy.

After you've selected, you'll be shown all the sell offers that fit in that range.

Peach fees are 2% of the trading amount.
help.buyingBitcoin.title: buying bitcoin
help.confirmPayment.description:
As soon as you swipe the "payment received" slider, the bitcoin will be sent to the buyer.

Make sure everything's correct, because this cannot be undone!
help.confirmPayment.title: payment received?
help.currency.description: If your online wallet can receive multiple currencies and do the conversion for you, you can select any currencies you can receive here.
help.currency.title: accepted currencies
help.escrow.description:
You pre-fund the escrow when making a trade on Peach. This protects both you and the buyer. You can read more about the escrow here.

Your offer will be published after one network confirmation. You can close the app while waiting for this.
help.escrow.description.proTip: You can long press the QR code to copy the full payment request.
help.escrow.title: Peach escrow
help.makePayment.description:
The sooner you make the payment, the better your reputation score for this trade will be!

If you don't make the payment within 12 hours, the seller can cancel the trade without any penalty.
help.makePayment.title: pay up quick!
help.mempool.description:
When you make a bitcoin transaction, it doesn't immediately get processed.

Instead, they are first put in a list of unconfirmed transactions called the "mempool". The transactions that pay the highest fee will be processed first.
help.mempool.title: the mempool
help.networkFees.description.1: These are the fees you pay to the bitcoin network to receive your sats after a trade, or in case of a refund. These fees change over time, depending on how busy it is.
help.networkFees.description.2: The busier the network, the more you'll need to pay to get a quick confirmation.
help.networkFees.title: bitcoin network fees
help.paymentMethodDelete.title: delete payment method?
help.paymentMethods.description.1: You can add & select as many payment methods as you want for each trade!
help.paymentMethods.description.2: They are stored on your phone, and only the person that you trade with can see this information (unless you raise a dispute).
help.paymentMethods.description.3: Trusted payment methods have at least three finished trades and are older than 30 days.
help.premium.description:
You'll set a price offset relative to the market price (averaged from multiple exchanges).

The final price you're selling for will be determined when a buyer matches your offer.
help.premium.title: the price is relative
help.referral.description.1: For every 10.000 sats that your referrals trade on Peach, you get a referral point.
help.referral.description.2: Save up your points to get cool rewards!
help.referral.title: Peach referral points
help.sellingBitcoin.description: Selling your sats on Peach is free of charge!
help.sellingBitcoin.title: selling bitcoin
help.tooLate.text.1: The seller has been notified that you were not on time. Now you'll have to wait until he makes a decision: either give you more time, or cancel the trade.
help.tooLate.text.2: In either case, your reputation has been impacted.
help.tooLate.title: too late!
help.tradingLimit.description:
Peach has to enforce trading limits to abide by Swiss law. There are three trading limits:

You can buy or sell CHF 1000 worth of bitcoin on Peach every day

You can buy or sell CHF 1000 worth of bitcoin with cash or online gift cards (aka anonymous payment methods) every month

You can buy or sell CHF 100 000 worth of bitcoin per year.
help.tradingLimit.title: trading limits
meetup.description: You can use cash to trade with your fellow bitcoiners at $0!
newUser.referralCode: and do you have a referral code?

peachBadges.fastTrader.description: A fast trader is as quick as the lightning network. They accept matches and make or confirm payments almost instantly.

restoreBackup.dontWorry: Don't worry! You can create a new Peach ID. This will have your existing reputation and trading limits.
restoreBackup.manual.description.1: select your backup file & enter your password
restoreBackup.restored.description.1: We restored your backup. Let's continue your Peer to Peer journey!

search.matchAsManyAsYouWant.1: You can match as many offers as you want!
search.matchAsManyAsYouWant.2: A trade will be created with the first seller who matches you back.
search.popups.acceptMatch.text:
You can only match one buyer per offer. Once you've accepted a match, the trade is started.

Once started, you can only do a collaborative cancel with your buyer, and your reputation will be harmed.
search.popups.acceptMatch.title: accept match = start trade
search.popups.cancelOffer.text.sell:
Are you sure?

The escrow will be refunded to $0 in your $1 wallet
search.popups.cancelOffer.title: cancel offer
search.popups.matchUndone.text:
Your reputation has not been affected, and you can always re-match.

When you unmatch after the timer runs out, your reputation will be negatively affected.
search.popups.matchUndone.title: match undone
search.popups.matchmatchmatch.text: You can match as many offers as you want! A trade will be created with the first Seller who matches you back.
search.popups.matchmatchmatch.title: match, match & match again
search.popups.offerTaken.title: offer taken...
search.popups.unmatch.text: Unmatching now will negatively affect your reputation score.
search.popups.unmatch.title: unmatch?
search.searchingForAPeer: Peach is searching for a peer
search.weWillNotifyYou: we'll notify you when there is a match!

sell.funding.mempool.description:
Your bitcoin transaction is pending...

You can go do something else, we'll automatically publish your offer as soon as it's finished!
sell.funding.mempool.title: transaction pending
sell.meansOfPayment: how would you like to be paid?
sell.premium.title: set your premium / discount

setRefundWallet.description: No refund address has been set for this trade. Please select one before continuing:
setRefundWallet.title: select refund wallet
settings.backups.fileBackup.popup.conten:
A file backup saves all the important information of your Peach account (since we do not!) & wallet.

You can only restore your file backup when you also have the password you make for it!

The seed phrase just restores the access to your wallet funds, so it's useful to have as well, should you lose your password.
settings.backups.fileBackup.popup.title: making a backup
settings.backups.fileBackup.popup2.conte: It's important that this password is secure, because it protects your data and your funds.
We do not store this password, and cannot help you recover it!
settings.backups.fileBackup.popup2.title: your password
settings.backups.fileBackup.title: backups
settings.backups.fileBackup.toRestore: to restore your Peach account & wallet
settings.backups.seedPhrase.noDigital: don't store your seed phrase digitally
settings.backups.seedPhrase.noPictures: never take pictures or screenshots of your seed phrase
settings.backups.seedPhrase.popup.text.1: A seed phrase is a random collection of 12 words that you can use to recover the funds on your Peach wallet in case of an emergency.
settings.backups.seedPhrase.popup.text.2: We do not store this seed phrase, and cannot help you recover it!
settings.backups.seedPhrase.popup.title: seed phrase?
settings.backups.seedPhrase.storeSafely:
store it in a secure location,
 like a safe or a lockbox
settings.backups.seedPhrase.writeItDown: write it down on a piece of paper
settings.backups.subtitle: backups
settings.bitcoinProducts.proSecurity.des: We use the open source bitbox to secure our own funds at Peach. That's why we recommend it to you as well!
You can use code PEACH for a 5% discount.
settings.deleteAccount.deleted.title: bye - bye data
settings.deleteAccount.forRealsies:
For realsies. 
No backup or no password = data gone!
settings.deleteAccount.popup: Without your backup AND your password, you will not be able to regain access to your account!
settings.deleteAccount.popup.title: delete account?
settings.deleteAccount.success: We hope to see you back soon!
settings.deleteAccount.success.title: account deleted
settings.deleteAccount.title: All your data will be wiped! Make sure you have a backup.
settings.displayCurrency.subtitle: display currency
settings.escrow.paymentRequest.label: Peach Escrow - offer
settings.escrow.subtitle: escrow
settings.fees.point.1: the bitcoin network fee for the payout
settings.fees.point.2: any fees you pay for using your selected payment method
settings.fees.text.2: of the total amount of the trade.
settings.fees.text.3: This excludes any other fees and markups, which may include:
settings.language.subtitle: display language
settings.networkFees.help:
These are the fees you pay to the bitcoin network to receive your sats after a trade, or in case of a refund. These fees change over time, depending on how busy it is.

The busier the network, the more you'll need to pay to get a quick confirmation.
settings.notifications.popup.title: turn off notifications?
settings.notifications.popup:
Without notifications, you'll not be informed when there's a match. 

Taking a long time to match someone back will negatively impact your reputation score.
settings.paymentMethods.subtitle: payment methods
settings.payoutAddress.popup:
By default, any trade payouts are sent to your Peach wallet.

If you want to have them sent somewhere else, you can enter a custom address here.
settings.payoutAddress.title: set custom address
settings.referrals.customReferralCode.po: Your custom referral code $0 is now active!
Let's get creative! Having a custom referral code is a lot more fun than all those numbers, right?
settings.referrals.noPeachFees.popup.suc: The free trading powerup is active. Let's get to it!
settings.referrals.noPeachFees.popup.tex:
Look, we like money. But we like you even more <3

By activating this powerup, you don't pay any Peach fees your next five trades.

The bigger those trades, the more you save!
settings.refundAddress.title: set custom refund address
settings.seedWords.note.description.1: A seed phrase is a random collection of 12 words that you can use to recover the funds on your Peach wallet in case of an emergency.
settings.seedWords.note.description.2: We do not store this seed phrase, and cannot help you recover it!

trade complete,

tradingCash.text: Please be safe and understand the risks of trading bitcoin in cash.

wallet.withdraw.help.text:
Here you can send the contents of your Peach wallet to another wallet of your choosing, for example a hardware wallet for extra security.

Peach recommends the BitBox hardware wallet for secure storage.
wallet.withdraw.help.title: sending funds

welcome.peerToPeer.description: With Peach, you don't buy from us, but from other people. It's like a marketplace for bitcoin!

welcome.privacyFirst.description: Your data is stored on your phone and is fully encrypted... We don't even want to know who you are.
